Profile

7+ years building web application. Values simplicity over complexity. Just DRY enough. Smiles at code with one job. Enjoys and values collabration. Experience with TDD and BDD software. Comfortable working on multiple layers of a project, front-end using javascript, backend using ruby, database using sql, and testing features.
